meanings.definition: Designed to prevent or deter shoplifting.
meanings.sent1: The store installed antishoplifting cameras to stop thieves.
meanings.sent2: The antishoplifting alarm went off when someone tried to steal a shirt.
meanings.sent3: The antishoplifting sign made the shoplifter think twice before taking anything.
meanings.sent4: Her vigilant eyes were like antishoplifting guards, catching any suspicious behavior.
meanings.sent5: The bright lights in the store acted as antishoplifting measures, making it hard to hide.

meanings.definition: A device or system used to prevent shoplifting.
meanings.sent1: The antishoplifting device at the entrance beeped loudly when someone tried to steal.
meanings.sent2: The security guard checked the antishoplifting system to ensure it was working properly.
meanings.sent3: The antishoplifting technology was so advanced that even the most skilled thieves couldn't bypass it.
meanings.sent4: The antishoplifting gates closed automatically, trapping the shoplifter inside.
meanings.sent5: The store manager invested in top-of-the-line antishoplifting equipment to protect their merchandise.
